description: T.1 Ash - 2-3m (approx 30%) crown reduction, deadwood and remove epicormic growth & deadwood.T.2 Lime - 2-3m (approx 30%) crown reduction, deadwood and remove epicormic growth & deadwood.Aerial health and safety inspection to be undertaken during works with particular attention to old pruning wounds and pollard points.
